com.twitter.heron.packing

Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.packing.Container

  • public class Container
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that describes a container used to place Heron Instances with specific memory, CpuCores and disk requirements. Each container has limited ram, CpuCores and disk resources.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Container(long maxRam, double maxCpuCores, long maxDisk) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(long ram, double cpuCores, long disk)
      Update the resources currently used by the container, when a new instance with specific resource requirements has been assigned to the container.
      boolean hasSpace(long ram, double cpuCores, long disk)
      Check whether the container can accommodate a new instance with specific resource requirements

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Container

        public Container(long maxRam,
                 double maxCpuCores,
                 long maxDisk)

    • Method Detail

      • hasSpace

        public boolean hasSpace(long ram,
                        double cpuCores,
                        long disk)
        Check whether the container can accommodate a new instance with specific resource requirements
        Returns:
        true if the container has space otherwise return false

      • add

        public boolean add(long ram,
                   double cpuCores,
                   long disk)
        Update the resources currently used by the container, when a new instance with specific resource requirements has been assigned to the container.
        Returns:
        true if the instance can be added to the container, false otherwise
